problemsArray.question:
Given f(x) = 3(x + 2)/(x + 8),
g(x) = (3x + 8)/(2x + 11)
Find (f + g)(x)
problemsArray.explanation:
By the function addition property, (f + g)(x) = f(x) + g(x)
(f + g)(x) = 3(x + 2)/(x + 8) + (3x + 8)/(2x + 11)
Equalize the denominators
(f + g)(x) = 3(x + 2)/(x + 8) * (2x + 11)/(2x + 11) + (3x + 8)/(2x + 11) * (x + 8)/(x + 8)
(f + g)(x) = 3(2x + 11)(x + 2)/(x + 8)(2x + 11) + (x + 8)(3x + 8)/(x + 8)(2x + 11)
Add the two expressions, then simplify

(f + g)(x) = (4x + 5)(3x + 8)/(4x + 5) + (2x + 11)/(4x + 5)
Add the two expressions, then simplify

g(x) = (2x + 5)/(x + 5)
Find (f + g)(x)
problemsArray.explanation:
By the function addition property, (f + g)(x) = f(x) + g(x)
(f + g)(x) = (4x + 1)/(x + 4) + (2x + 5)/(x + 5)
Equalize the denominators
(f + g)(x) = (4x + 1)/(x + 4) * (x + 5)/(x + 5) + (2x + 5)/(x + 5) * (x + 4)/(x + 4)
(f + g)(x) = (x + 5)(4x + 1)/(x + 4)(x + 5) + (x + 4)(2x + 5)/(x + 4)(x + 5)
Add the two expressions, then simplify

problemsArray.question:

(f + g)(x) = (2x + 1)/4 * (x + 3)/(x + 3) + 2(x + 1)/(x + 3) * 4/4
(f + g)(x) = (x + 3)(2x + 1)/4(x + 3) + 8(x + 1)/4(x + 3)
Add the two expressions, then simplify

problemsArray.question:
Given f(x) = (x + 10)/2(x + 2),
g(x) = (2x + 3)/(x + 11)
Find (f - g)(x)
problemsArray.explanation:
By the function subtraction property, (f - g)(x) = f(x) - g(x)
(f - g)(x) = (x + 10)/2(x + 2) - (2x + 3)/(x + 11)
Equalize the denominators
(f - g)(x) = (x + 10)/2(x + 2) * (x + 11)/(x + 11) - (2x + 3)/(x + 11) * 2(x + 2)/2(x + 2)
(f - g)(x) = (x + 11)(x + 10)/2(x + 2)(x + 11) - 2(x + 2)(2x + 3)/2(x + 2)(x + 11)
Subtract the two expressions, then simplify
